contentrichtext.text: '''Nikolay Fyodorov''' may refer to: *[[Nikolai Fyodorovich Fyodorov]], Russian Orthodox Christian philosopher and futurist *[[Nikolai Fyodorovich Vatutin]], Soviet military commander *[[Nikolay Petrovich Fyodorov]], animator at Soyuzmultfilm from the 1930s to the 1980s and director of a number of notable films in the 1950s and 1960s, including ''The Snow Queen'' (1957) *[[Nikolay Vasilyevich Fyodorov]], 1st President of [[Chuvashia]] and Russian Federal Minister of Agriculture. {{hndis|name=Fyodorov, Nikolay}}
